aiGenerator.title: AI Question Generator
aiGenerator.subtitle: Generate enterprise-grade survey questions with AI-powered validation
aiGenerator.configDescription: Set parameters for AI question generation
aiGenerator.accuracyModeTooltip: Standard: balanced generation. High: lower temperature for precision. Strict: blocks save/export if validation fails.
aiGenerator.rateLimitError: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait before generating more.
aiGenerator.creditsError: Insufficient AI credits. Please upgrade your plan.
aiGenerator.emptyDescription: Configure your parameters and click Generate to create AI-powered survey questions.
aiGenerator.validationFailed: Validation failed â€” review flagged questions
aiGenerator.strictModeMessage: Strict validation mode is active. Fix all failed questions before saving or exporting.
aiGenerator.knowledgeBaseDesc: Ground questions in international standards and custom references
aiGenerator.expertPromptDesc: Generates questions grounded in ISO 45003, COPSOQ III, UWES, WHO Guidelines, and Gallup Q12 frameworks
aiGenerator.frameworkISO10018: ISO 10018 & ISO 30414 â€” Engagement & HR Reporting
aiGenerator.frameworkWHO: WHO â€” Mental Health at Work Guidelines
aiGenerator.frameworkGallup: Gallup Q12 â€” Employee Needs Hierarchy
aiGenerator.uploadDocumentsDesc: Upload PDF, DOCX, or TXT files as additional AI context
aiGenerator.maxFileSize: Max 100MB per file, up to 5 documents (auto-removed after generation)
aiGenerator.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 100MB
aiGenerator.fileTypeNotAllowed: File type not supported. Use PDF, DOCX, TXT, or MD
aiGenerator.maxDocsReached: Maximum of 5 documents reached. Remove one to upload more
aiGenerator.noTenantError: You must be assigned to an organization to upload documents
aiGenerator.customPromptPlaceholder: Write your own instructions for the AI... e.g., 'Focus on remote work challenges and include questions about digital fatigue'
aiGenerator.customPromptTooltip: Add your own instructions to guide the AI. Use 'Rewrite as Expert' to enhance your prompt with professional psychometric language.
aiGenerator.selectFrameworks: Select frameworks to guide question generation
aiGenerator.referenceFrameworksDesc: Select standards to guide question generation. Each framework can have its own reference documents.
aiGenerator.purposeDescription: Choose where generated questions will be saved
aiGenerator.purposeSurveyDesc: Saved to survey batches for scheduled delivery
aiGenerator.purposeWellnessDesc: Saved as draft wellness questions for daily check-in
aiGenerator.wellnessPreviewDesc: Review {{count}} questions and their mood tags before saving as drafts.
aiGenerator.wellnessPreviewWarning: {{count}} question(s) have no mood tags assigned. They won't appear in any mood pathway.
aiGenerator.moodLevelTagsDesc: Tag these generated questions to appear as follow-ups for specific moods in the daily check-in.
aiGenerator.rewritePrompt: Enter instructions for how to improve this question...
aiGenerator.noMoodTags: No mood tags â€” question will not appear in any pathway
aiGenerator.moodTagsHint: This question will appear as a follow-up for these moods
aiGenerator.wellnessBatchOverflow: {{count}} will overflow to a new batch
aiGenerator.periodLocked: Period locked â€” categories are fixed
aiGenerator.createPeriodDesc: Lock categories & subcategories for a generation period

profile.title: My Profile
profile.description: View your account information, roles, and permissions
profile.allPermissionsGranted: You have super admin access - all permissions are granted
profile.superAdminDescription: You have full administrative access to all system features
profile.editProfileDescription: Update your name and profile picture
profile.fullNameTooLong: Name must be less than 100 characters
profile.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please use JPG, PNG, WebP or GIF
profile.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 2MB
profile.cropPhotoDescription: Adjust your photo to fit the avatar area
profile.changeEmailDescription: Update your email address. You'll need to verify the new email.
profile.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
profile.emailTooLong: Email must be less than 255 characters
profile.emailSameAsCurrent: New email must be different from current email
profile.emailAlreadyInUse: This email is already in use
profile.emailChangeWarning: A verification email will be sent to both your current and new email addresses. You must verify the new email to complete the change.
profile.emailVerificationSentDescription: We've sent verification emails to both your current and new email addresses. Please check your inbox and click the verification links.
profile.emailVerificationNote: The email change will only be completed after you verify the new email address.
profile.emailChangeError: Failed to update email. Please try again.
profile.changePasswordDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure
profile.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
profile.passwordTooLong: Password must be less than 72 characters
profile.passwordNeedsLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
profile.passwordNeedsUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
profile.passwordNeedsNumber: Password must contain at least one number
profile.passwordChangedSuccessfully: Your password has been updated successfully. You can now use your new password to sign in.
profile.passwordChangeError: Failed to update password. Please try again.
profile.deleteAccountWarning: This action is permanent and cannot be undone!
profile.deleteAccountDescription: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data from our system. This includes:
profile.deleteConsequence3: Access to all workspaces and resources
profile.accountDeletionRequested: Account deletion requested. You have been signed out.
profile.deleteAccountError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
profile.sessionManagementDescription: View and manage your active sessions across devices
profile.sessionSecurityNote: If you notice any suspicious activity, sign out from all devices immediately and change your password.
profile.allSessionsRevoked: All sessions have been terminated. Please sign in again.
profile.otherSessionsRevoked: All other sessions have been terminated.
profile.revokeSessionError: Failed to revoke sessions. Please try again.
profile.twoFactorAuthDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account using an authenticator app
profile.scanQRCode: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
profile.mfaSetupCompleteDescription: Your account is now protected with two-factor authentication. You'll need your authenticator app when signing in.
profile.mfaSetupError: Failed to set up two-factor authentication
profile.mfaVerifyError: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
profile.disableMFAWarning: Disabling two-factor authentication will make your account less secure!
profile.disableMFADescription: After disabling 2FA, you will only need your password to sign in. This makes your account more vulnerable to unauthorized access.
profile.loginActivityDescription: View your recent sign-in attempts and account access history
